clues_tr: Su akıtan ve dekoratif amaçlı kullanılan yapı.
clues_en: Structure used for flowing water and decorative purposes.
Found in parks and gardens.
Used for cooling and aesthetics.
Fast-growing tall tree species.
Used in wood and paper production.
Has broad and oval leaves.
Young and not yet mature duck.
Has yellow feathers.
Seen as cute and adorable.
Green organ of plants for photosynthesis.
Found in trees and flowers.
Falls in autumn.
Large ship used in sea transportation.
Operates with steam power.
Used for passenger and freight transport.

clues_tr: Yüksek rakımlı ve dağlık bir yerdir.
clues_en: Region in Asia.
High-altitude and mountainous place.
One of the important centers of Buddhism.
Fictional and long narrative form.
Published as a book.
Includes different themes and characters.

clues_tr: Özel anlar ve başarılar için verilir.
clues_en: Jewelry or award similar to a medal.
Usually worn around the neck.
Given for special moments and achievements.

clues_tr: Bilim, sanat ve teknoloji ile karakterize edilir.
clues_en: Developed society and cultural structures.
Various civilizations have formed throughout history.
Characterized by science, art, and technology.

clues_tr: Belirli bir sıralama ile yazılan maddeler bütünü.
Organizasyon ve düzen sağlamak için kullanılır.
clues_en: Set of items written in a specific order.
Can include shopping, tasks, or names.
Used for organization and order.

clues_tr: Kültürel ve sanatsal bir ifade biçimidir.
clues_en: Rhythmic and melodic arrangement of sounds.
Performed with instruments and vocals.
Form of cultural and artistic expression.

clues_tr: Yolcu taşımak için kullanılan büyük araç.
Şehir içi ve şehirlerarası ulaşımda kullanılır.
Genellikle belirli bir rotada hareket eder.
clues_en: Large vehicle used for transporting passengers.
Used in urban and intercity transport.
Usually moves on a specific route.

clues_tr: Yunan mitolojisinde avcılık ve doğa tanrıçası.
clues_en: Goddess of hunting and nature in Greek mythology.
Associated with the moon and archery.
Twin sister of Apollo.

clues_tr: Film ve video izlemek için kullanılır.

clues_tr: Eşyaların veya ürünlerin sarıldığı ve korunduğu ambalaj.
